text: The Kansas Legislature is the state legislature of the U.S. state of Kansas. It is a bicameral legislature. It has the lower Kansas House of Representatives and the upper Kansas Senate. There are 125 state representatives and 40 state senators. Representatives are elected for two- year terms, senators for four-year terms. They have a session every year."Kansas Legislative Research Manual Kansas Legislative Procedures," March 12, 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Kansas Legislature *Kansas Legislative Procedure Manual *Kansas House and Senate Journals, 1913-1955 (KGI Online Library) Category:Kansas Legislature Category:Government of Kansas
title: Kansas Legislature
